exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AlertSkin" width="327" height="205" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="17,16,26,27" source="alert_bg_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labText" text="标签" x="25" y="63" width="272" height="55" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="20"/>
	<e:Button id="btnOk" label="确定" y="157" width="111" height="56" anchorOffsetX="55.5" anchorOffsetY="28" x="95">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="input_ok_png" scale9Grid="37,14,76,28"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnCancel" y="157" anchorOffsetX="55.5" width="111" label="取消" height="56" anchorOffsetY="28" x="226">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="input_ok_png" scale9Grid="37,14,76,28"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BalanceSkin" width="326" height="449" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="15,15,30,30" source="input_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group id="grpBox4" width="280" y="255" height="50" x="23">
		<e:Label verticalAlign="middle" y="0" backgroundColor="0x52457D" locked="true" textAlign="center" width="100%" height="100%" background="true" x="0"/>
		<e:Label id="labName4" y="15" size="18" text="labName1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="7" width="100"/>
		<e:Label id="labGold4" y="12" size="22" text="+1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="126"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grpBox3" width="280" y="199" height="50" x="23">
		<e:Label verticalAlign="middle" y="0" backgroundColor="0x52457D" locked="true" textAlign="center" width="100%" height="100%" background="true" x="0"/>
		<e:Label id="labName3" y="15" size="18" text="labName1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="7" width="100"/>
		<e:Label id="labGold3" y="12" size="22" text="+1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="126"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grpBox2" width="280" y="143" height="50" x="23">
		<e:Label verticalAlign="middle" y="0" backgroundColor="0x52457D" locked="true" textAlign="center" width="100%" height="100%" background="true" x="0"/>
		<e:Label id="labName2" y="15" size="18" text="labName1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="7" width="100"/>
		<e:Label id="labGold2" y="12" size="22" text="+1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="126"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grpBox1" height="50" width="280" x="23" y="86">
		<e:Label x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" background="true" backgroundColor="0x52457d" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" locked="true"/>
		<e:Label id="labName1" text="labName1" x="7" y="15" size="18" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="100"/>
		<e:Label id="labGold1" text="+1" x="126" y="12" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btnOk" label="继续游戏" y="404" width="149" height="56" horizontalCenter="87.5" anchorOffsetX="84.5" anchorOffsetY="28">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="input_ok_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="24" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="labStep" text="第1局" x="80" y="11" width="164" height="26" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Group id="grpBox5" width="280" y="312" height="50" x="23">
		<e:Label verticalAlign="middle" y="0" backgroundColor="0x52457D" locked="true" textAlign="center" width="100%" height="100%" background="true" x="0"/>
		<e:Label id="labName5" y="15" size="18" text="labName1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="7" width="100"/>
		<e:Label id="labGold5" y="12" size="22" text="+1" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="126"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameButtonSkin" width="83" height="112" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="26" width="65" x="10" y="83" source="game_btn_text_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labName" text="加注" x="24" y="86" size="18" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Image id="imgIcon" height="87" width="83" x="0" y="0" source="follow_enable_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labText" text="标签" y="28" horizontalCenter="0.5" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="KeywordSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="56" height="58"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source.down="input_btn_down_png" source="input_btn_up_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" x="0" y="0" size="24" width="100%" height="100%" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" border="false" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="VSSkin" width="480" height="174" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="grpLeft" height="161" width="300" x="-20" y="0">
		<e:Image height="161" width="300" x="0" y="0" source="vs_left_png" locked="true"/>
		<e:Image height="139" width="99" x="60" y="6" source="seat_bg_png"/>
		<e:Label id="labName1" text="标签" x="69" y="12" size="14" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="73" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Image id="imgAvatar1" height="70" width="70" x="73" y="38" source="face_jpg"/>
		<e:Label id="labPoint1" text="1111" x="75" y="117" size="18" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="65" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grpRight" height="161" width="300" x="193" y="19">
		<e:Image height="161" width="300" x="0" y="0" source="vs_right_png" locked="true"/>
		<e:Image source="seat_bg_png" width="99" y="11" height="139" x="150"/>
		<e:Image id="imgAvatar2" source="face_jpg" width="70" y="42" height="70" x="163"/>
		<e:Label id="labPoint2" y="121" text="1111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="65" size="18" x="167"/>
		<e:Label id="labName2" y="17" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="73" size="14" x="160"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="imgLose" height="80" width="80" x="85" y="73" source="lose_png" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="40" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="800" width="480" x="0" y="0" source="game_bg_jpg" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btnStartGame" label="开始" width="83" height="87" verticalCenter="-15.5" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="follow_enable_png" source.down="follow_disable_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-5.5" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="labTip" x="159" y="515" text="底注：1     单注上限：8" size="15" width="162" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true" textColor="0x16753A"/>
	<e:Group id="seat2" height="150" width="180" x="0" y="403">
		<e:Image id="imgBg2" source="seat_bg_png" width="99" y="9" height="139" x="7"/>
		<e:Image source="card_bg_png" y="51" id="cardcImg9" width="54" height="46" x="117"/>
		<e:Image id="faceImg2" source="face_jpg" width="70" y="41" height="70" x="20"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel2" y="15" size="14" text="大哥看我的" width="87" height="16" x="11" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Image id="cardaImg2" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="113"/>
		<e:Image id="cardbImg2" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="123"/>
		<e:Image id="cardcImg2" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="134"/>
		<e:Label id="goldLabel2" y="121" size="18" text="1000" x="20" width="69" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Image id="statImg2" y="61" x="107" width="65" height="24" source="cards_viewed_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="seat1" width="180" y="190" height="150" x="0">
		<e:Image id="imgBg1" height="139" width="99" x="7" y="9" source="seat_bg_png"/>
		<e:Image y="51" id="cardcImg7" width="54" height="46" x="113" source="card_bg_png"/>
		<e:Image id="faceImg1" source="face_jpg" width="70" y="41" height="70" x="20"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel1" y="14" size="14" text="大哥看我的" width="88" height="16" x="11" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Image id="cardaImg1" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="113"/>
		<e:Image id="cardbImg1" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="123"/>
		<e:Image id="cardcImg1" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="52" height="43" x="134"/>
		<e:Label id="goldLabel1" y="121" size="18" text="1000" x="21" width="67" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Image id="statImg1" height="24" width="65" x="107" y="61" source="cards_ready_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="seat3" width="180" height="150" x="300" y="403">
		<e:Image id="imgBg3" source="seat_bg_png" width="99" y="9" height="139" x="78"/>
		<e:Image source="card_bg_png" y="50" id="cardcImg10" width="54" height="46" x="10"/>
		<e:Image id="faceImg3" source="face_jpg" width="70" y="41" height="70" x="91"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel3" y="15" size="14" text="大哥看我的" width="84" height="16" x="85" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Image id="cardaImg3" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="51" height="43" x="12"/>
		<e:Image id="cardbImg3" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="51" height="43" x="23"/>
		<e:Image id="cardcImg3" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="51" height="43" x="34"/>
		<e:Label id="goldLabel3" y="122" size="18" text="1000" x="92" textAlign="center" width="68"/>
		<e:Image id="statImg3" y="61" x="6" width="65" height="24" source="cards_givenup_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="seat4" width="180" y="190" height="150" x="298">
		<e:Image id="imgBg4" source="seat_bg_png" width="99" y="9" height="139" x="78"/>
		<e:Image source="card_bg_png" y="52" id="cardcImg8" width="54" height="46" x="12"/>
		<e:Image id="faceImg4" source="face_jpg" width="70" y="41" height="70" x="91"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel4" y="15" size="14" text="大哥看我的" textAlign="center" width="87" height="16" x="81" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Image id="cardaImg4" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="53" height="43" x="14"/>
		<e:Image id="cardbImg4" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="53" height="43" x="25"/>
		<e:Image id="cardcImg4" source="card_back_png" width="32" y="53" height="43" x="36"/>
		<e:Label id="goldLabel4" x="94" y="121" size="18" text="1000" textAlign="center" width="66"/>
		<e:Image id="statImg4" y="62" x="8" width="65" height="24" source="cards_lose_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image y="664" width="111" height="29" source="game_btn_text_png" scale9Grid="17,12,30,2" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labRoomId" text="000000000" y="138" size="30" width="220" height="26" textColor="0x266D43" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="labMyPoint" text="0" y="583" size="20" height="19" width="57" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labMyTotal" x="202" y="668" size="20" text="100" width="75" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image height="26" width="95" x="204" y="188" source="game_btn_text_png" scale9Grid="28,11,13,3"/>
	<e:Label id="labTotal" text="0" x="233" y="191" size="18" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFE7A8" width="59" height="19"/>
	<e:Image height="44" width="35" x="201" y="173" source="total_icon_png"/>
	<e:Button id="btnLook" y="719" width="105" height="41" horizontalCenter="7.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="view_card_png" source.disabled="view_card_disable_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image height="52" width="47" y="608" source="mycoin_png" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Button id="btnDisband" label="解 散" y="437" width="113" height="41" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="login_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-1.5" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="labTimer" label="15" y="422" width="40" height="44" anchorOffsetX="20" anchorOffsetY="22" x="339">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="timer_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="-1" verticalCenter="-4" size="16" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x000000"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="IndexSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="index_bg_jpg" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image height="212" width="212" x="17" y="570" source="index_enter_bg_png" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image height="212" width="212" x="254" y="570" source="index_create_bg_png" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="imgEnterBg" height="212" width="212" x="122" y="676" source="index_enter_bg2_png" anchorOffsetX="106" anchorOffsetY="106"/>
	<e:Image id="imgEnter" height="151" width="176" x="122" y="678" source="index_enter_png" anchorOffsetX="88" anchorOffsetY="75"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCreateBg" height="212" width="212" x="361" y="676" source="index_create_bg2_png" anchorOffsetX="106" anchorOffsetY="106"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCreate" height="151" width="176" x="359" y="680" source="index_create_png" anchorOffsetX="88" anchorOffsetY="75"/>
	<e:Group id="grpInput" height="449" width="326" y="113" horizontalCenter="-1" visible="false">
		<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="input_bg_png" locked="true"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum1" label="1" x="23" y="149" width="68" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum2" y="149" x="93" width="68" label="2" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum3" y="149" x="163" width="68" label="3" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnBackspace" y="149" x="233" width="68" label="退格" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum4" y="221" x="23" width="68" label="4" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum5" y="221" x="93" width="68" label="5" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum6" y="221" x="163" width="68" label="6" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnCloseKeyboard" y="221" x="233" width="68" label="关闭" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum7" y="293" x="23" width="68" label="7" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum8" y="293" x="93" width="68" label="8" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum9" y="293" x="163" width="68" label="9" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnNum0" y="293" x="233" width="68" label="0" height="70" skinName="KeywordSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="btnOk" label="确定" x="161" y="406" width="149" height="56" anchorOffsetX="74" anchorOffsetY="28">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="input_ok_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="24"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label text="请输入房间号" x="95" y="11" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="22" textColor="0xEBDCBB"/>
		<e:Image height="59" width="278" x="22" y="85" source="enter_input_jpg" scale9Grid="95,13,122,44"/>
		<e:Label id="labRoomId" x="45" y="96" width="234" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" height="36" text="11111111" size="32" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="login_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="btnLogin" x="210" y="551" width="113" height="41" label="登  录">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="login_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-2.5" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="22"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TopbarSkin" width="480" height="72" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="topbar_bg_png" alpha="0.3"/>
	<e:Label id="labelName" text="这是我的名字" x="75" width="225" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" height="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelGold" width="69" y="25" size="20" text="10000" x="367" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Image height="62" width="62" x="7" source="face_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,24,27,19" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="imgAvatar" height="50" width="50" x="13" source="face_jpg" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image height="26" width="145" x="328" y="22" source="game_btn_text_png" scale9Grid="24,11,12,2" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image height="27" width="35" x="324" y="20" source="diamond_png"/>
	<e:Image height="15" width="15" x="449" y="27" source="add_png" alpha="0.6"/>
</e:Skin>
